content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hi Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I don't want to provide the specific details of the apartment online, but let's talk about the price. I'm sure we can find a price that suits both of our interests.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That makes sense. I would like to offer you 550 euros per month for the apartment. This price includes all utility bills.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, Mr. Abbasi, but that's too low for me. I'm looking for a price that reflects the quality and location of my apartment. Why don't we try again?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I am willing to increase the offer to 580 euros per month. This price includes all utility bills. I believe this is a fair price for the quality and location of the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, Mr. Abbasi, but I believe the apartment is worth more. I think we can do better.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. I am willing to increase the offer to 600 euros per month. This price includes all utility bills. I believe this is a fair price for the quality and location of the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for increasing your offer, Mr. Abbasi, but I still believe the apartment is worth more. Let's try one more time.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. I am willing to increase the offer to 620 euros per month. This price includes all utility bills. I believe this is a fair price for the quality and location of the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for considering my request, Mr. Abbasi. However, I believe the apartment is worth more. Let's try again.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. I am willing to increase the offer to 640 euros per month. This price includes all utility bills. I believe this is a fair price for the quality and location of the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your patience, Mr. Abbasi. I believe we have found an agreeable price. I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
